message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm open to discussing this further if you have any questions or thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can come to a more agreeable price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000 for the product.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  I understand your perspective, but $20,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept.  To make this work, I could come down to $18,000.  Let me know what you think.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $18,000 is still above my desired price, I believe we can find common ground. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16,000 for the product.
